text: I really love rap music. I grew up in the '80s and '90s with Public Enemy, N.W.A., LL Cool J - I'm a hip-hop encyclopedia. But I got kind of frustrated with the chauvinistic side of rap music, the one that makes it hard to write songs about love and relationships.

text: This wired generation is kind of cool.

text: Spiderman can climb walls and he's got a cool outfit.

text: Atlanta is an incredibly cool city.

text: I don't mind not being cool.
